name: Plebeian Sojourn
description: This is a text-based game I wrote in Python back in the fall semester of 2017 for my Intro to CS class. I still get a kick out of it even though it's kind of short, so I thought I'd make it more easily accessible to the public. There are fun references to other science-fiction creations sprinkled throughout, but the story is new. There are many ways to lose, and only one way to win. A fully-played game takes about twenty minutes.
